data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 23,269 lost in Flores that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Flores, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Flores, Uruguay by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, move the 1,831 believers in the state of Flores to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Flores to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Trinidad
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Trinidad, Flores, Uruguay.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 8,402 who are far from you in Flores, Uruguay from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Flores.
Spirit, help the people of the the state of Flores to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.
